title: Donning a Smoking Jacket and Getting The Funk Out
itunes:title: Donning a Smoking Jacket and Getting The Funk Out
description:
It’s the week before the boys head to Cuba, and this week Dave dons his Smoking Jackets as we light up the cigar, Smoking Jacket before we get the funk out. 

In the second hour we smoke a unicorn from United Cigar & Selected Tobacco, an Atabey Lancero. 

Cigars News, Debonaire and a step into the Asylum round out the #1 Cigar Podcast on the internet
